<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- ImplicitNullChecks.cpp - Fold null checks into memory accesses -----===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass turns explicit null checks of the form</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   test %r10, %r10</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   je throw&#95;npe</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   movl (%r10), %esi</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   faulting&#95;load&#95;op(&quot;movl (%r10), %esi&quot;, throw&#95;npe)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// With the help of a runtime that understands the .fault&#95;maps section,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// faulting&#95;load&#95;op branches to throw&#95;npe if executing movl (%r10), %esi incurs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a page fault.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Store and LoadStore are also supported.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// canHandle makes sure that we &#95;can&#95; correctly analyze the dependencies</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between A and B here -- for instance, we should not be dealing with heap</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;DependenceMO : DependenceMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a999b8f3e58e7ca479f26445bae791a7c">operands</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!(DependenceMO.isReg() &amp;&amp; DependenceMO.getReg()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure that we won&#39;t clobber any live ins to the sibling block by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hoisting Dependency.  For instance, we can&#39;t hoist INST to before the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// null check (even if it safe, and does not violate any dependencies in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the non&#95;null&#95;block) if %rdx is live in to &#95;null&#95;block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    test %rcx, %rcx</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    je &#95;null&#95;block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#95;non&#95;null&#95;block:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %rdx = INST</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This restriction does not apply to the faulting load inst because in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case the pointer loaded from is in the null page, the load will not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// semantically execute, and affect machine state.  That is, if the load</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// was loading into %rax and it faults, the value of %rax should stay the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same as it would have been had the load not have executed and we&#39;d have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branched to NullSucc directly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a65d34a1acd6c2473aab0fabe963fccfb">AnyAliasLiveIn</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>, NullSucc, DependenceMO.getReg()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The dependence does not clobber live-ins in NullSucc block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;NotNullSucc, &#42;NullSucc;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NotNullSucc-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a03936a9b37da541420049422204ab206">pred&#95;size</a>() != 1)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> PointerReg = MBP.LHS.getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MBP.ConditionDef) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To prevent the invalid transformation of the following code:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   mov %rax, %rcx</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   test %rax, %rax</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %rax = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   je throw&#95;npe</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   mov(%rcx), %r9</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   mov(%rax), %r10</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   mov %rax, %rcx</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %rax = ....</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   faulting&#95;load&#95;op(&quot;movl (%rax), %r10&quot;, throw&#95;npe)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   mov(%rcx), %r9</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we must ensure that there are no instructions between the &#39;test&#39; and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conditional jump that modify %rax.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(MBP.ConditionDef-&gt;getParent() ==  &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Should be in basic block&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.rbegin(); MBP.ConditionDef != &amp;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;modifiesRegister(PointerReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Starting with a code fragment like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   test %rax, %rax</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   jne LblNotNull</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  LblNull:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   callq throw&#95;NullPointerException</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  LblNotNull:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Inst0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Inst1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Def = Load (%rax + &lt;offset&gt;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we want to end up with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Def = FaultingLoad (%rax + &lt;offset&gt;), LblNull</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   jmp LblNotNull ;; explicit or fallthrough</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  LblNotNull:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Inst0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Inst1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  LblNull:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   callq throw&#95;NullPointerException</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To see why this is legal, consider the two possibilities:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  1 %rax is null: since we constrain &lt;offset&gt; to be less than PageSize, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     load instruction dereferences the null page, causing a segmentation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     fault.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  2 %rax is not null: in this case we know that the load cannot fault, as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     otherwise the load would&#39;ve faulted in the original program too and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     original program would&#39;ve been undefined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This reasoning cannot be extended to justify hoisting through arbitrary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// control flow.  For instance, in the example below (in pseudo-C)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    if (ptr == null) &#123; throw&#95;npe(); unreachable; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    if (some&#95;cond) &#123; return 42; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    v = ptr-&gt;field;  // LD</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we cannot (without code duplication) use the load marked &quot;LD&quot; to null check</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ptr -- clause (2) above does not apply in this case.  In the above program</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the safety of ptr-&gt;field can be dependent on some&#95;cond; and, for instance,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ptr could be some non-null invalid reference that never gets loaded from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because some&#95;cond is always true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineInstr &#42;, 8&gt;</a> InstsSeenSoFar;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : &#42;NotNullSucc) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!canHandle(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) || InstsSeenSoFar.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() &gt;= <a href="#ae2a816fe56f4da1acc8eae48a349e9d0">MaxInstsToConsider</a>)</span></CodeLine>
